scene_description_enriched: A haloed figure, identified as Saint Mark, is depicted seated and writing on a parchment. He wears a blue tunic and a reddish-brown cloak, with a green cap. To his right, a lion, a symbol of Saint Mark, sits attentively. The scene takes place indoors, within a room characterized by architectural elements suggesting a classical or Renaissance style, with fluted columns and decorative friezes. A lectern with an open book stands behind the saint, and a richly carved wooden structure is visible to his left. The floor is tiled with blue and brown patterns.
